Sentencas: We evaluate two kinds of solid-oxide-fuel-cell (SOFC)-polymer-electrolyte-fuel-cell (PEFC) combined systems by numerical simulation to investigate the effect of the fuel feeding method.
Titulo: The effect of fuel feeding method on performance of SOFC-PEFC system

Sentencas: In one, fuel for the system is reformed by using exhaust heat from the SOFC and is separately supplied to the SOFC and PEFC (parallel SOFC-PEFC system).
Titulo: The effect of fuel feeding method on performance of SOFC-PEFC system

Sentencas: In the other, fuel is fed to the SOFC first and then SOFC exhaust fuel is fed to the PEFC (series SOFC-PEFC system).
Titulo: The effect of fuel feeding method on performance of SOFC-PEFC system

Sentencas: The quality of the fuel gas in the SOFC is better in the latter system, whereas the quality of the fuel gas in the PEFC is better in the former.
Titulo: The effect of fuel feeding method on performance of SOFC-PEFC system

Sentencas: We demonstrate that larger PEFC output can be obtained in the parallel SOFC-PEFC system, since more steam, which is included in the SOFC anode exhaust gas, can be used for the reforming of the fuel for the PEFC.
Titulo: The effect of fuel feeding method on performance of SOFC-PEFC system

Sentencas: We show that the series SOFC-PEFC system provides higher electrical efficiency because the fuel gas quality has a stronger influence on the electromotive force in the SOFC than in the PEFC.
Titulo: The effect of fuel feeding method on performance of SOFC-PEFC system
